content: this easy-to-follow pattern will have you creating your own chill pill plushies the photo is made using sweet snuggles lite yarn easily use a different yarn to make this item smaller or larger you can make tons of different color variations & and faces skill level beginner need to know for this pattern single_crochet magic_ring increase decrease slip_stitch you can use any weight yarn you prefer the weight of yarn hook size and gauge will determine the size of your plushie this pattern is an instant download please log into etsy from your computer to access the download supplies needed yarn - blanket yarn 2 different colors hook - 5 mm hook appropriate hook for the size yarn you use to get stitches that do not show stuffing scissors tapestry needle 12-14mm safety eyes can be larger or smaller for the look you are going after stitch marker poly fill or stuffing of choice
